data.description: Information Technology (IT) Intern Summer 2026 At StandardAero, we use our ingenuity and know-how to find solutions for the simple to the most complex challenges in Aviation. Together, we get the job done and done well. Our stability, resources, and respectful culture supports you in building a solid career with a great team you can count on day in and day out for the long term. StandardAero is seeking a motivated, eager, and innovative student looking to join one of our Information Technology (IT) Teams for the 2024 Summer Intern Term. As an intern Information Technology Intern at StandardAero, you will gain hands-on industry experience, learn from experts, and collaborate with our teams that raise the standard of excellence. Over the course of your 10–12-week (or longer) internship, you’ll have the opportunity to: Be involved or working in our PowerBI environment Collaboration, teamwork, and having each other's backs are the norm here.
